description.en: This data is is based on the Household Income and Basic Amenities Survey (HIS & BA) 2019. The survey is carried out twice in five years to produce representative data regarding income, poverty and access to basic amenities for Malaysian households. In the original HIS & BA 2019 Report, this data was reported as deciles, specifically B1-B4 (also known as the B40), M1-M4 (M40) and T1-T2 (T20). This has now been deepened from deciles to percentiles, such that there are 100 datapoints available for each series.
description.bm: Data ini dihasilkan berdasarkan Survei Pendapatan Isi Rumah dan Kemudahan Asas (HIS & BA) 2019. Survei itu dilaksanakan dua kali dalam tempoh lima tahun bagi tujuan menghasilkan data pendapatan, kemiskinan dan akses kepada kemudahan asas bagi isi rumah warganegara. Dalam Laporan HIS & BA 2019 yang asal, data ini dilaporkan sebagai desil, khususnya B1-B4 (umumnya dirujuk sebagai B40), M1-M4 (M40) dan T1-T2 (T20). Ia kini telah diperdalam daripada desil ke persentil, maka terdapat 100 data bagi setiap siri data.

variables.name: state
variables.desc_en: [Categorical] Name of the state (16 in total)

variables.name: mean
variables.title_en: Mean Income by Percentile and State
variables.title_bm: Pendapatan Purata mengikut Persentil dan Negeri
variables.desc_en: [Integer] Mean monthly household income for percentile K, such that K% of households have income less than or equal to this figure.
variables.desc_bm: [Integer] Purata pendapatan bulanan isi rumah bagi persentil K, sebagaimana K% daripada isi rumah mempunyai pendapatan yang kurang daripada ataupun sama dengan angka ini.

variables.name: median
variables.title_en: Median Income by Percentile and State
variables.title_bm: Pendapatan Median mengikut Persentil dan Negeri
variables.desc_en: [Integer] Median monthly household income for percentile K, such that K% of households have income less than or equal to this figure.
variables.desc_bm: [Integer] Penengah pendapatan bulanan isi rumah bagi persentil K, sebagaimana K% daripada isi rumah mempunyai pendapatan yang kurang daripada ataupun sama dengan angka ini.

variables.name: minimum
variables.title_en: Minimum Income by Percentile and State
variables.title_bm: Pendapatan Minimum mengikut Persentil dan Negeri
variables.desc_en: [Integer] Minimum monthly household income within percentile K, such that no household within percentile K has income below this figure. Note that there is no minimum provided for the 1st percentile.
variables.desc_bm: [Integer] Pendapatan bulanan isi rumah minimum dalam persentil K, sebagimana tiada isi rumah dalam persentil K yang mempunyai pendapatan kurang daripada angka ini. Tiada angka minimum bagi persentil 1.

variables.name: maximum
variables.title_en: Maximum Income by Percentile and State
variables.title_bm: Pendapatan Maksimum mengikut Persentil dan Negeri
variables.desc_en: [Integer] Maximum monthly household income within percentile K, such that no household within percentile K has income exceeding this figure. Note that there is no maximum provided for the 100th percentile.
variables.desc_bm: [Integer] Pendapatan bulanan isi rumah maksimum dalam persentil K, sebagimana tiada isi rumah dalam persentil K yang mempunyai pendapatan melebihi angka ini. Tiada angka maksimum bagi persentil 100.

en.methodology: This data is is based on the Household Income and Basic Amenities Survey (HIS & BA) 2019. The survey is carried out twice in five years to produce representative data regarding income, poverty and access to basic amenities for Malaysian households. In the original HIS & BA 2019 Report, this data was reported as deciles, specifically B1-B4 (also known as the B40), M1-M4 (M40) and T1-T2 (T20). This has now been deepened from deciles to percentiles, such that there are 100 datapoints available for each series.
en.caveat: This data is more detailed than the originally-published statistics, and should therefore be interpreted with the appropriate level of caution.
en.publication: The [Household Income & Basic Amenities Survey Report, 2019](https://www.dosm.gov.my/v1/index.php?r=column/pdfPrev&id=TU00TmRhQ1N5TUxHVWN0T2VjbXJYZz09).

bm.methodology: Data ini dihasilkan berdasarkan Survei Pendapatan Isi Rumah dan Kemudahan Asas (HIS & BA) 2019. Survei itu dilaksanakan dua kali dalam tempoh lima tahun bagi tujuan menghasilkan data pendapatan, kemiskinan dan akses kepada kemudahan asas bagi isi rumah warganegara. Dalam Laporan HIS & BA 2019 yang asal, data ini dilaporkan sebagai desil, khususnya B1-B4 (umumnya dirujuk sebagai B40), M1-M4 (M40) dan T1-T2 (T20). Ia kini telah diperdalam daripada desil ke persentil, maka terdapat 100 data bagi setiap siri data.
bm.caveat: Data ini adalah lebih terperinci berbanding dengan statistik yang asalnya diterbitkan, maka perlu ditafsir dengan berhati-hati.
bm.publication: [Laporan Survei Pendapatan Isi Rumah dan Kemudahan Asas, 2019](https://www.dosm.gov.my/v1/index.php?r=column/pdfPrev&id=TU00TmRhQ1N5TUxHVWN0T2VjbXJYZz09).
